nodes.text: Ghtroc Industries was a respected starship manufacturer headquartered on Clak'dor, homeworld of the Bith species. It notably produced the 690 and 720 light freighter models, but went defunct after the commercial failure of its Cargo Empress super freighter.

Ghtroc Industries was first mentioned in Rebel Enslaved!, a 1991 expansion for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game of Star Wars Legends. Ghtroc Industries was later canonized in Before the Awakening, a junior novel written by Greg Rucka and published in 2015.
